div.head: To the godlie and Christian Reader.
div.p: BE aduertised J pray thee (gentle Reader) and that for thine owne good, and better vnderstanding of the things thou shalt reade in this booke, that wheresoeuer thou shalt finde this .i. it signifieth as much as, that is to say: and where these two letters q.d. are vsed, it importeth thus much, as though he would say: and obserue withall, that vz. is to wit, &c. Other things I doubt not but thou wilt of thy selfe through Gods blessing well perceiue, as the more learned sort shall also without me: and yet for those that had not such skill, I could not but note these things; as for those that haue attained to more vnderstanding and knowledge this Distichon.

q.l: Sperare in Christum, & vitae tolerare labores,
Et benè posse mori disce: beatus eris.
